TriggerOraclev10g.name: INCIDENT_HISTORY_TRG
TriggerOraclev10g.body: DECLARE<br/> history_id_v number;<br/> employee_id_v number;<br/>BEGIN<br/> <br/> select HISTORY_ID_SEQ.nextval, app.get_user into history_id_v, employee_id_v from dual;<br/> <br/> insert into incidents_history(<br/> HISTORY_ID<br/> ,CHANGE_DATE<br/> ,EMPLOYEE_ID<br/> ,INCIDENT_ID<br/> ,IMPACT_CODE<br/> ,URGENCY_CODE<br/> ,STATUS_CODE<br/> ,REVIEW<br/> ,PRIORITY_CODE<br/> ,CATEGORY_CODE<br/> ,SUBJECT<br/> ,DESCRIPTION<br/> ,STAFF_MEMBER<br/> ,RESOLUTION<br/> ,SOURCE_CODE<br/> ,RESOLUTION_DATE<br/> ,GROUP_ID<br/> ,TARGET_RESOLUTION_DATE<br/> )<br/> values(<br/> history_id_v<br/> , sysdate<br/> , employee_id_v<br/> , :new.INCIDENT_ID<br/> , :new.IMPACT_CODE<br/> , :new.URGENCY_CODE<br/> , :new.STATUS_CODE<br/> , :new.REVIEW<br/> , :new.PRIORITY_CODE<br/> , :new.CATEGORY_CODE<br/> , :new.SUBJECT<br/> , :new.DESCRIPTION<br/> , :new.STAFF_MEMBER<br/> , :new.RESOLUTION<br/> , :new.SOURCE_CODE<br/> , :new.RESOLUTION_DATE<br/> , :new.GROUP_ID<br/> , :new.TARGET_RESOLUTION_DATE<br/> );<br/> <br/>END;
